trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <see langword="hexBinary" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il wrapping di un tipo <see langword="hexBinary" /> XSD.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui tipi di dati XSD, vedere "Riferimenti dei tipi di dati XML" in MSDN Library al http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the members in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapHexBinary> class to convert between a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapHexBinary> object and an XSD `hexBinary` string.
